guild_age.description: Sets the default age required for an guild in order to use Rodhaj

account_age.description: Sets the default age required for an account that has joined the guild that Rodhaj is operating on

mention.description: Sets the default mention to use when new tickets are created
notes: Pass in an empty string in order to disable this

anon_replies.description: Enables the anonymous replying feature of Rodhaj. This affects the guild itself.

anon_reply_without_command.description: Anonymously reply without using the command

anon_snippets.description: Enable the usage of sending snippets anonymously
